channel.title: GRAAL on Mathieu @ ULaval
channel.description: Recent content in GRAAL on Mathieu @ ULaval

item.title: Master
item.description: I’m delighted to stay in the realm of the GRAAL research group under the guidance of François Laviolette for my MSc in Computer Science. A new set of challenges and opportunities is forthcoming!

item.title: GRAAL
item.description: I’m glad to be part of the GRAAL research group for this summer. The group is led by François Laviolette and Mario Marchand and their interests are machine learning and its practical applications. This is my first experience with machine learning and it should be fun!
